{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3144410,"name":"CHRISTOPHER E HANSON","username":"XenonofArcticus","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/x/9e8a1a/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-12T22:53:43.757Z","cooked":"

https://www.vexrobotics.com/217-5046.html

“Discontinued”.

We have one and we’d like to use it on our robot, but don’t want to have a single point of failure, so we’d like a cold spare.

Anyone have one sitting in an old box that they don’t plan to use? We’ll buy it from you.
